```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

**Local Climate Zones (LCZ) and Urban Heat Islands Analysis in QGIS! A LCZ4r-QGIS plugin repository that integrates the LCZ4r package with QGIS in multiple languages.**


```{r, include = FALSE}
if(!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("djnavarro/bs4cards", upgrade = "never")
library(bs4cards)

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
#Text
text_introduction <- "LCZ-QGIS plugin integrates the General Functions and Local Functions from LCZ4r package into QGIS, allowing users to analyze LCZs and urban heat islands directly within the QGIS environment."
text_instalation <- "You can watch a detailed tutorial on installing LCZ4r in QGIS above or link below."

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Create the dataframe
df_default <- data.frame(
  title_card = c("Introduction to LCZ4r-QGIS plugin", 
                "Installing LCZ4r in QGIS"
                ),
  short_name = c("LCZ4r project", 
                 "LCZ4r project"
                 ),
  author = c(
           "Published on 01 Jan 2025", 
           "Published on 01 Jan 2025"
           ),
  description = c(
    text_introduction,
    text_instalation
  ),
  type_translation = c(
    "LCZ4r Project",
    "LCZ4r project"
  ),
  image_url = c(
    "logo_qgis.png",
    "installing.png"
  ),
  gallery_url = c(
    "https://bymaxanjos.github.io/LCZ4r/articles/Introd_QGIS_LCZ4r.html",
    "https://www.youtube.com/embed/RalGSgx8v2Q"
  )
)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Generate cards
bs4cards::cards(
    data = df_default,
    title = title_card,
    text = description,
    link = gallery_url,
    image = image_url,
    footer = author,
    header = short_name,
    width = "row-cols-2",
    spacing = 5,
    border_width = 1,
    border_radius = 2,
    border_colour = "#F2F0ED"
    
  )
```


## Multilingual Plugins

Please, select your preferred language:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
#Multilingual texts
text_english <- "A LCZ4r-QGIS plugin integrates the General Functions and Local Functions from LCZ4r package into QGIS environment."
text_portuguese <- "O plugin LCZ4r-QGIS integra as Funções Gerais e as Funções Locais do pacote LCZ4r no ambiente QGIS."
text_deutsch <- "Das LCZ4r-QGIS-Plugin integriert die allgemeinen Funktionen und lokalen Funktionen des LCZ4r-Pakets in die QGIS-Umgebung."
text_chinese <- "LCZ4r-QGIS插件将LCZ4r包中的通用功能和地方功能集成到QGIS环境中。"

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}

           "Published on 01 Jan 2025 - Author(s)",

           ),
```
